item.title: Trump announces $11 billion tariff relief for farmers
item.description: Farmers — particularly those who produce soybeans — have felt the effect of the president’s tariff policies.

item.title: Supreme Court poised to expand Trump’s power over independent agencies
item.description: A ruling in favor of Trump’s position has been expected by legal experts because the justices have been chipping away at a precedent known as Humphrey...

item.title: Alina Habba, Trump’s embattled New Jersey prosecutor, says she will leave role
item.description: In a statement, Habba said she resigned “to protect the stability and integrity of the office which I love.”

item.title: One night inside the ‘Trump Kennedy Center’
item.description: The president reveled in his control of the arts facility, as his allies cheered his hosting duties and called to rename the building after him.

item.title: Allred drops Senate bid in Texas, will instead run for redrawn House seat
item.description: The former Democratic congressman, who lost his 2024 Senate bid to Sen. Ted Cruz (R-Texas), says a bruising Senate primary could threaten party unity.
